total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells in the input grid that are surrounded by the same number on all four sides (up, down, left, right).
Q2: Check if the number surrounding the cell in Q1 is greater than the number in the cell.
Q3: If the condition in Q2 is met, replace the number in the cell with the surrounding number.
Q4: Repeat Q1-Q3 for all cells in the input grid.

Q1: Identify the cells in the input grid that are surrounded by the same number on all four sides (up, down, left, right).
Q2: Check if the number surrounding the cell is greater than the number in the cell.
Q3: If the number surrounding the cell is greater, replace the number in the cell with the surrounding number.
Q4: Repeat this process for all cells in the grid.
Q5: The final grid after all replacements is the output grid.
